text: Bhisiana is a census town in Bathinda district in the state of Punjab, India. ==Demographics== India census, Bhisiana had a population of 4775. Males constitute 59% of the population and females 41%. Bhisiana has an average literacy rate of 75%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 78% and female literacy of 69%. 15% of the population is under 6 years of age. Bhisiana air force base is one of the most strategically important bases in India, including a UAV unit. ==References== Category:Bathinda Category:Cities and towns in Bathinda district
title: Bhisiana
